channel.title: Aerosail - Koi Pond
channel.description:
So today, I officially released my first ever single titled "Koi Pond" and I'm hoping you guys would give it a listen.
Links:
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/aerosail/koi-pond
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/68H4D1M6iYAJ6jbNauX7Cd?si=m6t0yJagRWm_AEBJ6zv-LA
(You can pretty much find this in any other music streaming services.)
Also in lieu to the song's release, I'm holding up a remix contest for the song. To those who would like to participate in this, well, good for you. 5 winners who'd be able to remix my masterpiece will be able to have a place in all my profiles in those music streaming services (as I'd be making a remixes album). So then, good luck!
Here's the copy of the song: https://app.auxy.co/projects/Be7GzbmP480q83HQ6cQ6yw==

item.title: Aerosail - Koi Pond
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
I mean this as a compliment; I nearly drifted off to sleep listening to this. Very relaxing, thanks for sharing!

Read full topic

item.description:
So today, I officially released my first ever single titled “Koi Pond” and I’m hoping you guys would give it a listen.

Links:

Also in lieu to the song’s release, I’m holding up a remix contest for the song. To those who would like to participate in this, well, good for you. 5 winners who’d be able to remix my masterpiece will be able to have a place in all my profiles in those music streaming services (as I’d be making a remixes album). So then, good luck!
